General.Name: Sonda S.A
General.Description: Sonda S.A., together with its subsidiaries, provides information technology (IT) solutions in Latin America, Chile, Brazil, Mexico, Argentina, Colombia, Costa Rica, Ecuador, Panama, Peru, and Uruguay. The company offers consulting services that support digitization; APP modernization services; big data & analytics, which combined with artificial intelligence solutions enhance decision-making in clients' organizations; digital automation solutions, such as RPA, Hyperautomation, and RaaS; digital quality; turnkey development services; and digital management services. It also provides infrastructure solutions to the outsourcing of all the technological platforms of the client's business; support, maintenance, and administration services; cloud & data center services, including hosting, monitoring, managing, exploiting, operating and maintaining basic services, servers, connectivity, data, and software both in the public cloud; cybersecurity solutions, such as cybersecurity asset management, detection of threats and vulnerabilities, advanced cybersecurity services, as well as consulting and testing services; workplace and help desk services; and technical assistance to users, such as notebooks, PCs, printers, and operating systems. In addition, the company engages in the sale of computing infrastructure, including servers, workstations, tablets, PCs, printers, storage and backup equipment, communications equipment, databases, operating systems, and others. Further, it provides implementation, maintenance, and guarantee management of the assets. The company was incorporated in 1974 and is headquartered in Santiago, Chile.
